The '''Fontaine Shrine of Depths Key''' is an Adventure Item which can be used to unlock the [[Shrines of Depths]] in [[Fontaine]] and the [[Sea of Bygone Eras]], allowing players to access the [[chest]] inside. Keys do not correspond to specific shrines, meaning any key can be used to unlock any shrine in Fontaine.

10 Fontaine Shrine of Depths Keys are obtainable, allowing the player to unlock every shrine in Fontaine and the Sea of Bygone Eras.
